description:
Yuzuka wants her dad to meet Miton. After he seems reluctant at first, wacky hijinks ensue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est mal de mentir à sa famille
Is Employee Labor Even Tougher Than Magical Girl Battles?
Kaisha Tsutome to wa Mahou Shoujo no Sentou yori Kakoku na Roudou na no Kai?
会社勤めとは魔法少女の戦闘より過酷な労働なのかい?
